title: Ep. 615 - What Ruth Would Have Wanted
description:
While Democrats exploit the death of Ruth Bader Ginsburg, the late justice sends a message on her final wishes from beyond the grave. Then, rioters burn down more of our politics out of “love and compassion,” and BLM deletes its beliefs.
